name: Medicalholodeck Free 2.0
detailed_description:
Vive Version

This app only works with HTC Vive.


About the Software

Enter the Medicalholodeck and work on CT- and MRI-scans in real 3D using Virtual Reality glasses. Interact with 3D medical data, examine, teach, and study - in real time and in life size.

Medicalholodeck does volume rendering, which needs a powerful GPU. We recommend a GTX 1080, 1080TI or a Quadro P6000.

If necessary you can reduce the overall quality on the side of the controller UI.

Get free support and tutorials, contact us: info@medicalholodeck.com

Use this free version to check your hardware before purchasing the Medicalholodeck Personal Version on our website http://www.medicalholodeck.com.

Medicalholodeck provides various tools to examine, work and alter medical body scans. Once entered Medicalholodeck you will intuitively see, understand and interact with the CT- and MRI-scans of real people as never before.

The app can be used for medical teaching and studying, patient empowerment or surgery preparation.

short_description:
Enter the Medicalholodeck and work on CT- and MRI-scans in real 3D using Virtual Reality glasses. Interact with 3D medical data, examine, teach, and study - in real time and life size.

The software suite provides various tools to examine, work and alter medical body scans. Once entered Medicalholodeck you will intuitively see, understand and interact with the CT- and MRI-scans of real people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1080 TI, Quadro P6000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
